mean_cn: v. 使复活，使苏醒，使复兴
mean_en: to bring (someone who is unconscious, not breathing, or close to death) back to a conscious or active state again
word_etyma: re一再，重新+sus在…下面+cit唤起+ate动词后缀→恢复
short_phrase: They try to resuscitate the victim.
sentence: We tried to resuscitate the man after he fell, but he did not wake up.
sentence_trans: 这个男人摔倒之后，我们试图使他苏醒，但他没有醒过来。
